/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and depth to the scene. The buildings lining the street are adorned with colorful murals, adding a lively and artistic touch to the urban landscape. The street itself is bustling with activity, with cars and motorcycles parked along the sides and people going about their day. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
